ddl_statements.ddl:
CREATE TABLE DimCustomer (
  CustomerKey INT PRIMARY KEY,
  CustomerAlternateKey VARCHAR(15),
  FirstName VARCHAR(50),
  LastName VARCHAR(50),
  BirthDate DATE,
  Gender VARCHAR(1),
  EmailAddress VARCHAR(50),
  YearlyIncome DECIMAL(19,4),
  TotalChildren INT,
  EnglishEducation VARCHAR(40),
  EnglishOccupation VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE FactInternetSales (
  ProductKey INT,
  OrderDateKey INT,
  CustomerKey INT,
  SalesOrderNumber VARCHAR(20),
  SalesAmount DECIMAL(19,4),
  TaxAmt DECIMAL(19,4),
  Freight DECIMAL(19,4),
  OrderQuantity INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (CustomerKey) REFERENCES DimCustomer(CustomerKey),
  FOREIGN KEY (ProductKey) REFERENCES DimProduct(ProductKey)
);

CREATE TABLE DimProduct (
  ProductKey INT PRIMARY KEY,
  ProductAlternateKey VARCHAR(25),
  EnglishProductName VARCHAR(50),
  StandardCost DECIMAL(19,4),
  ListPrice DECIMAL(19,4),
  Size VARCHAR(50),
  Weight DECIMAL(8,2),
  ProductLine VARCHAR(2),
  DealerPrice DECIMAL(19,4),
  Class VARCHAR(2),
  Style VARCHAR(2)
);

CREATE TABLE DimDate (
  DateKey INT PRIMARY KEY,
  FullDateAlternateKey DATE,
  DayNumberOfWeek INT,
  EnglishDayNameOfWeek VARCHAR(10),
  DayNumberOfMonth INT,
  DayNumberOfYear INT,
  WeekNumberOfYear INT,
  EnglishMonthName VARCHAR(10),
  MonthNumberOfYear INT,
  CalendarQuarter INT,
  CalendarYear INT,
  CalendarSemester INT,
  FiscalQuarter INT,
  FiscalYear INT
);

CREATE TABLE DimGeography (
  GeographyKey INT PRIMARY KEY,
  City VARCHAR(30),
  StateProvinceCode VARCHAR(3),
  StateProvinceName VARCHAR(50),
  CountryRegionCode VARCHAR(3),
  EnglishCountryRegionName VARCHAR(50),
  PostalCode VARCHAR(15)
);
